TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ActivityFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags DebugLogResolution = int32(8)
DebugLogResolution = 8

Docs.summary: A flag you can enable for debugging: when set, log messages will be printed during the resolution of this intent to show you what has been found to create the final resolved list.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags DirectBootAuto = int32(256)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ExcludeFromRecents = int32(8388608)
ExcludeFromRecents = 8388608

Docs.summary: If set, the new activity is not kept in the list of recently launched activities.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ExcludeStoppedPackages = int32(16)
ExcludeStoppedPackages = 16

Docs.summary: If set, this intent will not match any components in packages that are currently stopped.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ForwardResult = int32(33554432)
ForwardResult = 33554432

Docs.summary: If set and this intent is being used to launch a new activity from an existing one, then the reply target of the existing activity will be transfered to the new activity.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags FromBackground = int32(4)
FromBackground = 4

Docs.summary: Can be set by the caller to indicate that this Intent is coming from a background operation, not from direct user interaction.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags GrantReadUriPermission = int32(1)
GrantReadUriPermission = 1

Docs.summary: If set, the recipient of this Intent will be granted permission to perform read operations on the Uri in the Intent's data and any URIs specified in its ClipData.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags GrantWriteUriPermission = int32(2)
GrantWriteUriPermission = 2

Docs.summary: If set, the recipient of this Intent will be granted permission to perform write operations on the Uri in the Intent's data and any URIs specified in its ClipData.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags IncludeStoppedPackages = int32(32)
IncludeStoppedPackages = 32

Docs.summary: If set, this intent will always match any components in packages that are currently stopped.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags LaunchedFromHistory = int32(1048576)
LaunchedFromHistory = 1048576

Docs.summary: This flag is not normally set by application code, but set for you by the system if this activity is being launched from history (longpress home key).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags MatchExternal = int32(2048)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags MultipleTask = int32(134217728)
MultipleTask = 134217728

para.i: Do not use this flag unless you are implementing your own top-level application launcher.
Because the default system does not include graphical task management, you should not use this flag unless you provide some way for a user to return back to the tasks you have launched.

summary.para: See Tasks and Back Stack for more information about tasks.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ReceiverForeground = int32(268435456)
ReceiverForeground = 268435456

Docs.summary: If set, when sending a broadcast the recipient is allowed to run at foreground priority, with a shorter timeout interval.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ReceiverRegisteredOnly = int32(1073741824)
ReceiverRegisteredOnly = 1073741824

Docs.summary: If set, when sending a broadcast only registered receivers will be called -- no BroadcastReceiver components will be launched.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags ResetTaskIfNeeded = int32(2097152)
ResetTaskIfNeeded = 2097152

Docs.summary: If set, and this activity is either being started in a new task or bringing to the top an existing task, then it will be launched as the front door of the task.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.ActivityFlags SingleTop = int32(536870912)
SingleTop = 536870912

Docs.summary: If set, the activity will not be launched if it is already running at the top of the history stack.
